clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Lobectomy + lymph node dissection. For postoperative N0, adjuvant chemotherapy with EP/EC regimen; for N1-2, plus mediastinal radiotherapy.

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Limited-stage SCLC, inoperable or refuse surgery
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Concurrent chemoradiotherapy with etoposide + cisplatin/carboplatin. Radiotherapy starts in cycle 1-2 of chemotherapy.

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Extensive-stage SCLC, first-line treatment for PS 0-2
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Immunotherapy combined with chemotherapy: atezolizumab/serplulimab/adebrelimab + etoposide + carboplatin for 4 cycles → immunotherapy maintenance; or tislelizumab/durvalumab + etoposide + cisplatin/carboplatin for 4 cycles → immunotherapy maintenance. Chemotherapy alone: EP (cisplatin + etoposide), EC (carboplatin + etoposide), or IP (irinotecan + cisplatin).

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: May predict immunotherapy efficacy, but not required for treatment decision

clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Thoracic radiotherapy for patients with CR/PR after chemotherapy, e.g., 30 Gy/10 fractions, to reduce recurrence risk.

Asymptomatic: systemic treatment first, then whole-brain radiotherapy (WBRT) ± stereotactic radiotherapy (SRS). Symptomatic: WBRT first (e.g., 30 Gy/10 fractions), then systemic treatment after symptoms stabilize.

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Recurrent SCLC, sensitive relapse (chemotherapy ended >6 months ago)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Original regimen or topotecan or irinotecan.

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Transformed SCLC with systemic rapid progression

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Confirm RB1 deletion for diagnosis of transformation
Confirm TP53 deletion for diagnosis of transformation
Confirm EGFR mutation status prior to treatment

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Transformed SCLC with systemic slow progression

biomarker_requirements.testing_guidance: Confirm EGFR mutation status if EGFR-TKI is used

biomarker_clinical_significance.clinical_significance: proGRP and NSE are used for diagnosis and efficacy monitoring; TMB may predict efficacy of immunotherapy; MGMT methylation predicts better response to temozolomide; SLFN11 predicts sensitivity to PARP inhibitors; CTCs assist in staging and treatment assessment.

tcm_recommendations.tcm_treatment_plan: Consider traditional Chinese medicine for managing radiotherapy complications
